OpenSim.Services.GridInfoHandlers.GridInfoHandlers ( IConfigSource  configSource,
IRegistryCore  registry 
)

Instantiate a GridInfoService object.

Parameters:
configPath path to config path containing grid information

GridInfoService uses the [GridInfo] section of the standard Aurora.ini file --- which is not optimal, but anything else requires a general redesign of the config system.
